suppressedMessages.message: React Hook useEffect has a missing dependency: 'loadBondDetails'. Either include it or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [bondId, loadBondDetails]

messages.message: The 'loadCumulative' function makes the dependencies of useEffect Hook (at line 39) change on every render. Move it inside the useEffect callback. Alternatively, wrap the definition of 'loadCumulative' in its own useCallback() Hook.
